title: [LFT] CC Wiz Kalista - Bronze-Diamond Team

embed.description: Summoner Lookup with statistics, ratings, LoLSkillScore and more for CC Wiz Kalista, a League of Legends summoner on the Oceania region.

body:
Hey just looking for a team that i can drop in with when i feel like it play some games and get a decent rank 5s rank... I dont really care for what rank my team is and im willing to give some tips and take some tips if needed.



Main: Adc
2nd Priority: Fill


I play anywhere fairly well so hit us In game , i probably wont check this!

replies.body:
Im intrested my LOL account - MrLazyDude i can play every lane my mains are mid and Sup.
I am on nearly all day, i Dont care win or lose as long as we tried and had fun (childs saying),  but still i am looking forward to joina good team!!!
